reviewText: If your not a song writer or into grove. Your not going to like this tape. It doesn't teach songs but guitar tricks to enhance your playing an open up your ears from the norm. Matthieu knows his stuff!
got about 10 that i want...but a good dvd.

Wouldn't recommend this. Very mundane product as far as video lessons go. Used it for like 15 minutes and threw out because the instructor in the video was that annoying and monotone. Just use Youtube if looking for interesting chord tricks. Plenty of videos on there.
Based on these Chord tricks, you could write some fresh music. It is an inspiring collection of riffs that can springboard your creative juices.
